DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject Subject Unique Identifier java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information._A unique identifier assigned to each clinical trial subject to protect the subject's identity and used in lieu of the subject's name when the investigator reports adverse events and/or other trial-related data (ICH Guidelines)._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject Subject Unique Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information._A unique identifier assigned to each clinical trial subject to protect the subject's identity and used in lieu of the subject's name when the investigator reports adverse events and/or other trial-related data (ICH Guidelines).

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.
A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Property.preferredDefinition: A unique identifier assigned to each clinical trial subject to protect the subject's identity and used in lieu of the subject's name when the investigator reports adverse events and/or other trial-related data (ICH Guidelines).

Concepts.definition: A unique identifier assigned to each clinical trial subject to protect the subject's identity and used in lieu of the subject's name when the investigator reports adverse events and/or other trial-related data (ICH Guidelines).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
